About Us

Serving our community for over 30 years, Rand's Perk and Environmental Services Inc. is fully qualified and insured to install a radon reducing system in your home.

All work is guaranteed and is backed by a reputation built on integrity.

Radon

Radon is a radioactive gas that is found in nearly 1 out of 15 homes in the U.S. The Surgeon General
has warned that radon is the second leading cause of lung
cancer in the United States today.

Rand's Perk and Environmental Services is certified to install a radon mitigation system in your home. Such a system can significantly reduce the radon level to below the EPA's action level of 4 pCi/L.
